title: Casual Notes on a Small Gathering of Old Friends
content: Tonight, I spent a long time chatting with Chunmei while doing handicrafts. She shared many practical methods for taking care of the elderly at home and highlighted several key points: 1. For elderly individuals with poor leg circulation, learning a few simple leg massage techniques can be very helpful when done before bedtime. 2. In terms of diet, it’s important to control salt and fat intake, and trying some easily digestible recipes can be beneficial. 3. Special attention should be paid to preventing falls in certain small areas at home, such as the bathroom and hallways. After our conversation, I felt much more at ease, and we encouraged each other.
summarized_info: Recorded reflections from the gathering with Chunmei the previous day, highlighting several specific aspects of elderly care discussed during the conversation, including leg massage, dietary control, and fall prevention.

title: Arrangements regarding father's medical treatment
content: I called the hospital for consultation this morning. The hospital operator said: 1. Based on the provided name and previous hospitalization records, my father's examination results show a stable condition, but regular follow-up visits are required. 2. The registration time is from 8:00 to 10:30, and it is recommended to arrive early. The specialist is Director Zhang. I have informed my mother to prepare the materials and confirmed with Zhiqiang that we will accompany our parents there tomorrow morning.

title: Home Cooking Common Ingredients Memo
content:
Dishes that the kids love to eat and I often cook myself:
1. Braised Noodles with Gravy: Essential ingredients include pork belly/tenderloin, dried black fungus, daylily flowers, and shiitake mushrooms. The gravy must be flavorful, with the meat being the key.
2. Sweet and Sour Pork Tenderloin: Mainly made with tenderloin, fried until crispy on the outside and tender on the inside.
3. Stir-Fried Seasonal Vegetables: No matter what meat dish is prepared, pairing it with a plate of seasonal vegetables is always a good idea—nutritious and refreshing.

These dishes are basically staples at home, and the ingredients are often bought in bulk, several varieties at a time.
summarized_info: I have documented a list of common ingredients for several traditional home-cooked dishes, including the meats required for noodles with gravy and sweet and sour pork, as well as the vegetables that are often paired with them.

title: Key Points for Learning Seed Stitch
content: On the morning of February 9, 2025, I consulted Aunt Wu from Cangzhou via WeChat video to learn the seed stitch technique. Aunt Wu pointed out that the key is to wrap the thread around the needle once before piercing the fabric, as this helps create even and plump flower stamens. After practicing a few times, the results improved noticeably. Aunt Wu also recommended related instructional videos on Douyin for further reference.
summarized_info: I documented the key points and learning process of the seed stitch technique as taught by Aunt Wu, mentioning that the communication method was via WeChat video.

title: Recipe for Homemade Noodles with Gravy
content: Prepare the ingredients: slice pork belly, soak wood ear mushrooms in advance, prepare shiitake mushrooms, daylily flowers, and eggs. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry the pork slices until they release oil, then add scallions and ginger to sauté until fragrant. Pour in soy sauce, add water, and bring to a boil. Add wood ear mushrooms, shiitake mushrooms, and daylily flowers. Thicken the sauce with a starch slurry, drizzle in beaten eggs, and finally add a few drops of sesame oil. Pour the mixture over hand-pulled noodles.
summarized_info: Ma Xiulan documented a recipe for a homemade noodle sauce, which includes ingredients such as pork belly and wood ear mushrooms.

Looking back to relieve five strains and seven injuries. I slowed down each movement to feel the stretching of my body and the coordination with my breathing. I felt a slight warmth in my body and a sense of comfort. This gentle exercise rhythm suits me well, and I plan to stick with it.

title: Reflections on Morning Exercise on the Summer Solstice
content: June 21, 2025, Summer Solstice. I was awakened by the sound of rain in the early morning, and it was pouring heavily. To avoid disturbing my family and due to the weather, I completed my morning exercise entirely in the living room today. First, I took a slow walk around the living room for fifteen minutes, then practiced the entire set of Baduanjin. Especially for the movement "Shaking the Head and Wagging the Tail to Expel Heart Fire," I intentionally slowed down today to feel the rotation of my waist, and it felt smoother than before. After finishing, I sat by the window to watch the rain, feeling particularly calm inside. Because of the rain, my plans for outdoor walks and exercise were moved indoors, which also had its own unique charm.
summarized_info: Ma Xiulan recorded her experience of performing all her morning exercises (walking and Baduanjin) in the living room on the summer solstice due to rain.

Now that March is here, I want to actively add something new to my life and try out different habits. I’m not aiming to master it perfectly—just to kickstart each day and get my body moving.

title: A day worth remembering
content: Today, I handed over the embroidery to Sister Zhou, and my craftsmanship was praised, which made me especially happy. Most importantly, I received the final payment of 320 yuan. After returning home, I combined it with the spare change I usually save, and it added up to exactly 500 yuan. I went to the bank and opened my very first fixed deposit certificate. This amount may not be much, but it holds extraordinary significance—it was earned through my own skills and hard work. I feel like I’ve taken another step closer to my goal of improving my family’s life with this craft. I must continue to work hard and maintain quality, hoping that Sister Zhou and Sister Zheng will think of me in the future.

title: Key Points of Financial Management Lecture and Family Discussion Notes
content:
June 18, 2025  
Key Takeaways from the Community Financial Management Seminar:  
1. The current inflation rate is higher than the interest rate on demand deposits, posing a risk of hidden depreciation of funds.  
2. Medium- to long-term fixed deposits (e.g., 3-year terms) offer favorable interest rates and can help preserve value to some extent.  

Discussion with Zhiqiang in the Evening:  
Given our current savings of approximately 50,000 yuan and the future financial pressure of our child's education expenses, we have agreed to take the first step toward building long-term family reserves. We plan to convert a portion of our savings (e.g., 30,000 yuan) into a three-year fixed deposit. We will make time to visit the bank to complete this process within the month.
summarized_info: Ma Xiulan took notes on the knowledge about inflation and fixed deposits from the financial management lecture, and after discussing with her husband, decided to convert a portion of their family savings into fixed deposits.

title: Reflections on Handling Family Relationships Recently
content: On November 17th, I had an in-depth conversation with Sister Chunmei. Drawing from her own experiences with her child, she offered me invaluable advice: 1. When facing conflicts, parents should first manage their own emotions and avoid communicating in the heat of the moment. 2. Choose a time when the child is emotionally stable and the atmosphere is relaxed (such as after meals or during leisurely weekends) for informal conversations. 3. During communication, shift your approach to act more like a friend and listener—focus on understanding rather than judging, and first seek to uncover the true thoughts and feelings behind the child's behavior. I found this very enlightening. My next step is to discuss this with Zhiqiang and try using this approach to re-establish dialogue with Xiaofei.
summarized_info: Ma Xiulan documented the advice and communication methods for handling parent-child conflicts obtained from Liu Chunmei, and plans to discuss with her husband before implementing them.

Finally, I bought a simple blue pen holder, hoping he would like it. Today, I showed it to him, and seeing him nod, I felt everything was worth it.

title: Reflections on Manual Income Distribution
content:
Just completed a major order and received a payment of 500 yuan.  
Originally, I planned to put it all into the 'Family Emergency Fund.' However, after careful consideration over the past couple of days, I realized that my children's education is a long-term priority and shouldn't rely solely on emergency funds.  

Decision: Allocate this 500 yuan to the 'Education Reserve Fund' specifically.  
Starting next month, the allocation of my manual income needs to be clearer: part of it will be used for daily expenses, while another portion (e.g., 30%) can be considered as a supplement for Mingxuan's boarding school or other educational goals. This way, all the 'money bags' can gradually grow.

She also considered that a portion of her future handicraft income, such as 30%, could be used to supplement educational expenses, such as her eldest child's boarding school costs.

I don’t know how much longer I can hold on.

title: Chain Stitch Practice Notes
content: January 2nd. I watched several beginner tutorial videos and finally understood the basic stitching technique for chain embroidery. I kept practicing, and by bedtime, I had finally embroidered a small section of continuous, neat chain stitches! It felt very rewarding. I also finished drawing the cross-stitch pattern, which I’ll practice next time. All of this is in preparation for the handicraft workshop—I need to get familiar with the techniques myself first.

title: Training Notes - Ecological Pest Control
content:
Community Training Record, March 12, 2025:
1. The instructor emphasized the use of common ingredients to create natural insect repellents, which are environmentally friendly and non-polluting.
2. Chili-garlic water recipe: Chop dried chili peppers, peel and crush garlic, mix them together, soak in water for more than 24 hours, then filter the liquid and spray. Primarily effective against aphids, spider mites, etc.
3. The dilution ratio and precautions during use were highlighted. This method is simple and practical, and I plan to try it in my home vegetable garden.
summarized_info: Ma Xiulan documented the specific method of making natural insect repellent using chili peppers and garlic, which she learned in the community training.

title: Making insect repellent water with Sister Wang.
content: April 3, 2025. In the afternoon, my neighbor Wang Guilan came to my home, and we made a chili-garlic insect repellent together. Following the method taught in the recent community training session, we peeled garlic, chopped chili peppers, crushed them, and soaked them in water. I explained the principles and usage to Sister Wang, and she learned attentively, saying she would try it at home as well. I hope this natural method will help protect our small vegetable garden.
summarized_info: Ma Xiulan documented the process of making a chili and garlic insect repellent with her neighbor Wang Guilan, noting that the method was taught in the previous community training session.
